DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 1870 year 2 . MM patient first second complete partial remission 3 . ECOG performance status 0 1 4 . Up 3 prior treatment regimens 5 . Meet eligibility requirement autologous transplant 6 . Adequate marrow function define WBC > 3,000 ; ANC > 1,500/mm3 ; Platelets > 75,000/mm3 7 . Adequate renal function define creatinine clearance > 30 mL/min CockcroftGault 8 . Adequate liver function define AST/ALT/Bilirubin < 2 time upper limit normal 9 . Able provide inform consent 10 . Women pregnant agree use contraception 1 . High risk comorbidities acute treatment complication ( e.g. , symptomatic coronary artery disease ) 2 . Brain metastasis carcinomatous meningitis 3 . Previous treatment high dose chemotherapy autologous transplant . 4 . Previous attempt collect BHPCs follow mobilization growth factor alone , growth factor chemotherapy , plerixafor growth factor . 5 . Acute infection unexplained fever > 38Â°C 6 .
